Notes:

Tracks 1-1 to 1-4 taped for American Bandstand at ABC TV Studios, Hollywood, CA on 16 Dec 1979, aired on 26 Jan 1980.

Tracks 1-12 to 1-15 taped by Prince and Nadeara in 1978.

Tracks 1-16 to 1-18 taped for The Midnight Special, NBC, 6 Jan 1980.

Track 2-1 taped for Saturday Night Live at Studio 8H, RCA Building, NBC TV Studios, Burbank, CA on 21 Feb 1981.

Tracks 2-13 to 2-15 taped live at Sam's, Minneapolis, MN on 9 March 1981.

Tracks 3-10 and 3-11 taped live at The Ritz, New York, NY, 22 March 1981.

Tracks 4-8 to 4-12 taped live at The Met Center, Bloomington, MN on 7 March 1982.

Tracks 4-13 to 4-17 Prince taped live, opening for The Rolling Stones at The Memorial Coliseum, Los Angeles, CA on 11 Oct 1981
